about_the_game:
Welcome to the Asylum! The Asylum Furnishings is the latest collection of GameGuru MAX assets from amazing artist MonkeyFrog Studios.

If you're planning your own horror game, creepy dystopian world, post apocalyptic nightmare or modern day adventure, then this is THE pack for you.

Included in this massive pack of high quality assets you'll find lall the parts you need to decorate your own asylum or Victorian hospital with a comprehensive range of props.

The pack provides beds, curtains, mattresses, medical equipment, office furniture and a lot more. You'll find assets to make bathrooms, a chapel, a morgue, bedrooms, offices, waiting room and a load of signs and props to decorate with.

In addition to all of this, almost all media comes with 3 different texture sets, ranging from clean, through dirty and finally, blood soaked, giving you a huge range of options.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
